name: Eternia Escape
description:
Uncover the secrets of Eternia Laboratories in this thrilling mega-man inspired action game! Encounter six difficult but fair bosses on your journey to discover what keeps this paradoxical lab afloat. Are you up for the challenge?

Game by Vaporsea (Johnathan Schofield)

Music  by  Nikki: https://linktr.ee/pyrist
